title: Top 10 Travel Tools
description:
Welcome to episode 170 of Sleep and Relax ASMR! This episode I talk about some of my favorite (and some I would like to try in future) travel tools. Enjoy!

  • HaloVa Travel Backpack, Anti-theft: http://amzn.to/2gwdCC3
  • Mack’s Pillow Soft Silicone Earplugs: http://amzn.to/2zgCPrZ
  • Zoppen Multi-purpose RFid Blocking Travel Passport Wallet: http://amzn.to/2yFXj0a
  • Logitech Bluetooth keyboard: http://amzn.to/2yctly3
  • Cabeau Memory Foam Travel Pillow http://amzn.to/2zigACa
  • ZZZBand Blind Fold for travel: http://amzn.to/2xzh9FG
  • Acrodo Space Saver Compression Bags: http://amzn.to/2gcbOBv
  • Bizond Mini Clothes Steamer: http://amzn.to/2zf2AJf
  • Stall Mates flushable wipes: http://amzn.to/2xzdS9o
  • Nau Urban fashion jacket no wrinkle: http://amzn.to/2xzAjeE

Secret link: Check it out

Website: www.SleepandRelaxASMR.com

Email Us: Hello@SleepandRelaxASMR.com
